name: Greenling Game
description:
GREENLING GAME

A PANDEMIC is sweeping through a small town, the source is a fast food chain PINK DRINK. Fight to survive against the afflicted RED hostiles. Get revenge on the on the one who's turned your skin NEON GREEN.

Concept art booklet: acmedraws.gumroad.com

CONTROLS
  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • J to sip
  • K to spit
  • L to view life
DISCLAIMER

Greenling Game is in development. Controller and mobile support is not currently working in the HTML browser version of the game. The quit function from the pause menu just crashes the game in browser so you will have to refresh the page to start again.
